quick_context: T-007 complete: /export-docs command added for git-first workflows. Exports memory items as individual markdown files with YAML frontmatter. Supports --tags/--project filtering and custom export paths. New exportPath config option. 108 tests passing. Type-check clean. All v0.2 tasks done (T-001 through T-007). T-006 superseded by T-007.
